headline: EDWARDS ROTARY VANE VACUUM PUMP 19.4 CFM
description: Rotary Vane Vacuum Pump   Once sold, all mechanical vacuum pumps will be rebuilt to factory specifications, unless stated otherwise.  All rebuilt pumps are sold with a one year warranty on parts and labor.  Pumps can be ordered Fomblin® or standard hydrocarbon oil prepped.
keywords: mechanical vacuum pump backing pump roughing pump two stage pump
categories.lvl2: Vacuum Processing Equipment  >  Vacuum Pumps > Rotary Vane Pumps
specstable:
Manufacturer Edwards
Model E2M30
Pumping Speed 19.4 CFM (548.2 l/m)
Motor Horsepower 1.5 HP
Power Requirements 115/ 230 V 14.8 A 7.4 A(2) 50/60 Hz 1 Phase
